channel.title: Making "vengance Quest"
channel.description: I want to make it so that when you beat a quest (q == 1) You can use the last spell in the ancheint spellbook. But i have a lot of problems. 1. i can't add quests because instead of quests shops come up. I can change the font it says but i can't change how to make those menus come up. If someone will add me on msn i could explain more and it would be easier. [img]http://i326.photobucket.com/albums/k421/lesterknome/ththg.jpg[/img]

item.title: Making "vengance Quest"
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

change the first dialog that the npc says to a choice dialog. Make the choices “Talk about quest” or “check out the shop”. or something. Make the choices send you to each.
